titleStmt.title: A brief censure vppon two bookes written in answere to M. Edmonde Campions offer of disputation
Briefe censure uppon two bookes written in answere to M. Edmonde Campions offer of disputation.
titleStmt.author: Parsons, Robert, 1546-1610.

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 4534 on UMI microfilm reel 416.
At foot of title page: With privilege.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (reel 416) and the Folger Shakespeare Library (reel 581).
Appears at reel 416 (British Library copy) and at reel 581 (Folger Shakespeare Library copy).
